data.text: @ThetfordSteven If close to blood bank, donate. That’s what I did when younger.  Orange juice and cookies after.  😊
@Originalmugwug Believe it or not, I have no idea what blood type I am. I guess I should figure it out lol!

@ThetfordSteven You still got covid?  Hope that doesn’t happen to me.  I’m a fatty, old, and type A blood - all of which make me a target.  By the way, what’s your blood type?  If that seems a silly question, I ask everybody bc I think interesting.  Probably you’re an O.  Most common/healthiest.
@Originalmugwug Yes I am triple vaxed, I haven't received anymore books yet. I haven't gotten rascal yet, only the wolfling. I guess this is a great opportunity to read since I have some down time.

@ThetfordSteven Reread. Sorry about the covid.  Curious.  I take it unvaccinated?  Well, you are now!  Glad you weathered it well.  YES!  I want recipe and tips. I find myself with too little to d o these days. And thank you in advance. By the way, did you get anymore books?  Read Rascal yet?

@Nv_pyromelana They fluctuate. I bounce off the walls early, then in the afternoon low grade fever settles in for a couple hrs. Lost taste/smell yesterday. My coffee tastes like sweet warm water. Got bleach all over the place because I couldn't smell it.
@ThetfordSteven Are you doing ok with symptoms?
